languages.text: "Когда мы были в Комморре... когда мы были... вместе..." {n}Дознаватель запинается.{/n} "Я мыслил не совсем рационально, поставив собственные желания выше долга. Пожалуй, я делал слишком большую ставку на то, что не выберусь из Комморры живым".

traits.locale_text: "Когда мы были в Комморре... когда мы были... вместе..." {n}Дознаватель запинается.{/n} "Я мыслил не совсем рационально, поставив собственные желания выше долга. Пожалуй, я делал слишком большую ставку на то, что не выберусь из Комморры живым".

languages.text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."
languages.original_text: "Когда мы были в Комморре... когда мы были... вместе..." {n}Дознаватель запинается.{/n} "Я мыслил не совсем рационально, поставив собственные желания выше долга. Пожалуй, я делал слишком большую ставку на то, что не выберусь из Комморры живым".

traits.locale_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

"When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

"When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

"When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

languages.text: “当我们在科摩罗的时候……当你我……在一起的时候……”{n}海因里希犹豫着，开了口。{/n}“我没能做到理智思考，我把自己的欲望凌驾在了责任之上。我猜，我当时肯定以为，已经不可能活着离开那个地方了。”
languages.original_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

traits.locale_text: “当我们在科摩罗的时候……当你我……在一起的时候……”{n}海因里希犹豫着，开了口。{/n}“我没能做到理智思考，我把自己的欲望凌驾在了责任之上。我猜，我当时肯定以为，已经不可能活着离开那个地方了。”

languages.text: «Mientras estábamos en Commorragh... cuando estuvimos... juntos...». {n}Heinrix titubea.{/n} «No estaba actuando de forma racional. Antepuse mis deseos a mis deberes. Supongo que contaba con que no saldríamos vivos de allí».
languages.original_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras estábamos en Commorragh... cuando estuvimos... juntos...». {n}Heinrix titubea.{/n} «No estaba actuando de forma racional. Antepuse mis deseos a mis deberes. Supongo que contaba con que no saldríamos vivos de allí».

languages.text: 「コモラフに…共にいた時…」{n}ハインリックスはためらう。{/n}「俺は理性的ではなかった。責務よりも自分の欲望を優先してしまっていた。あそこから生きて出られないと思っていたんだろう」
languages.original_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフに…共にいた時…」{n}ハインリックスはためらう。{/n}「俺は理性的ではなかった。責務よりも自分の欲望を優先してしまっていた。あそこから生きて出られないと思っていたんだろう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix parle de manière hésitante.{/n} « À Commorragh... quand nous étions... ensemble... je n'ai pas agi de manière rationnelle. J'ai fait passer mes propres désirs avant mon devoir. Je pense qu'au fond, j'étais persuadé que nous ne nous en sortirions jamais vivants. »
languages.original_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix parle de manière hésitante.{/n} « À Commorragh... quand nous étions... ensemble... je n'ai pas agi de manière rationnelle. J'ai fait passer mes propres désirs avant mon devoir. Je pense qu'au fond, j'étais persuadé que nous ne nous en sortirions jamais vivants. »

languages.text: "Als wir in Commorragh waren ... als wir ... zusammen waren ..." {n}Heinrix zögert.{/n} "Ich habe dort nicht rational gedacht. Ich habe meine eigenen Begehren über meine Pflicht gestellt. Ich schätze, ich bin einfach davon ausgegangen, dass wir diesen Ort niemals lebend verlassen würden."
languages.original_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

traits.locale_text: "Als wir in Commorragh waren ... als wir ... zusammen waren ..." {n}Heinrix zögert.{/n} "Ich habe dort nicht rational gedacht. Ich habe meine eigenen Begehren über meine Pflicht gestellt. Ich schätze, ich bin einfach davon ausgegangen, dass wir diesen Ort niemals lebend verlassen würden."

languages.text: "Commorragh'tayken... İkimiz... Birlikteyken..." {n}Heinrix tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Mantıklı bir şekilde düşünmüyordum. Şahsi arzularımı vazifemden üstün tutuyordum. Sanırım oradan asla sağ kurtulamayacağıma bel bağlamıştım."
languages.original_text: "When we were in Commorragh... when we were... together..." {n}Heinrix hesitates.{/n} "I wasn't thinking rationally. I was putting my own desires ahead of my duty. I suppose I was counting on never getting out of that place alive."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'dayken... İkimiz... Birlikteyken..." {n}Heinrix, tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Mantıklı bir şekilde düşünmüyordum. Şahsi arzularımı vazifemden üstün tutuyordum. Sanırım oradan asla sağ kurtulmayacağıma bel bağlamıştım."
